nodes.text: Terrogas were creatures displayed on circuses such as the Freklas Snarl Circus. They required training, provided by individuals like Prod.

Terroga was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
